title: OnlyPunk
author: OnlyPunk
content: Hey Bitcoiners!Looking to get rid of an old tablet that still works fine. Functioned as a cold wallet for a bit, but was never put to hard use. 4G LTE model from Verizon. Old retail was in the $400 range, though doesn't hold that value now  Accepting Bitcoin and other altcoins.An escrow/middleman is totally welcomed, and if you're trusted enough, I can go first! You pay when the product is in transit (pictures available, and details can be discussed)- OnlyPunk

comments.author: definevalue
comments.body: Quote from: OnlyPunk on November 08, 2022, 09:52:04 PMHey Bitcoiners!Looking to get rid of an old tablet that still works fine. Functioned as a cold wallet for a bit, but was never put to hard use. 4G LTE model from Verizon. Old retail was in the $400 range, though doesn't hold that value now  Accepting Bitcoin and other altcoins.An escrow/middleman is totally welcomed, and if you're trusted enough, I can go first! You pay when the product is in transit (pictures available, and details can be discussed)- OnlyPunkI'll take it off your hands if your cool with shipping it first. Since your only asking $15 for it.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Interested, let's make a deal.I have a weekly campaign payout (max $50) which seems pretty reassuring to you that I won't sacrifice $15 worth of reputation. You can simply charge that to my manager if I beat around the bush about payment.I'll only pay when the item reaches me (I'll take it for $20 instead), meaning you go first.If you agree, let's talk further.

comments.author: fennic
comments.body: Quote from: OnlyPunk on November 08, 2022, 09:52:04 PMHey Bitcoiners!Looking to get rid of an old tablet that still works fine. Functioned as a cold wallet for a bit, but was never put to hard use. 4G LTE model from Verizon. Old retail was in the $400 range, though doesn't hold that value now  Accepting Bitcoin and other altcoins.An escrow/middleman is totally welcomed, and if you're trusted enough, I can go first! You pay when the product is in transit (pictures available, and details can be discussed)- OnlyPunkI think that's a good deal as 15 dollars. Can you show proofs that you have this Galaxy Tab S10 and is this working and also there are other things that are needed to be considered. And I will say that you should give full details and also other such things like Shipping costs and in Which country are you?
